occupation: Personal Development Coach at Liv Teixeira Coaching
headline: Personal Development Coach, Podcast Host of “A Liv Teixeira Production”
summary:
Empowering success-driven individuals and teams to unlock their full potential through strategic business and performance coaching – Liv Teixeira is your partner for achieving excellence, minimizing friction, amplifying productivity, and surpassing your goals.

From Liv-
I am an adaptable and creative problem solver with the ability to persuade and engage others. I view myself as a strategist who can successfully take an individual or group from Point A to Point B to solve a problem, crisis, conflict, or intervention. The skills that allow me to do this include my level headed approach to conflict, ability to respond well to stress, and strong communication and listening skills. I constantly seek new business opportunities and I am always open to learning experiences. I enjoy connecting with like minded individuals. Personal goals include building business's success, health and wellness, traveling, skiing, continuous learning, personal development and making a difference in the lives of others by helping to change the quality and satisfaction of the lives of the people I work with.

I would like to “Leave the World a Little Better Than I Found It”.

experiences.title: Personal Development Coach
experiences.description:
Transforming high-profile individuals, entrepreneurs, teams, and C-suite executives, helping them achieve their business goals and enhance their leadership skills. With a data-driven approach and a history of fostering positive transformation, Liv builds strong relationships and drive exceptional client satisfaction.

Experienced Executive Coach: Coaching high-profile individuals, teams, and C-suite executives to achieve key performance indicators (KPIs) and business objectives.
Transformational Leadership: Coaching approach that  fosters positive change in perspective, motivation, and self-mastery, enhancing leadership capabilities and overall performance.
Tailored Coaching: Highly impactful one-on-one coaching sessions, focusing on business strategy alignment with individual and company goals.
Client Satisfaction: Exceptional client satisfaction through strategic planning, behavior change, and transformative coaching methods.
Continuous Learning: Stay updated with the best coaching practices to optimize execution and deliver results.
Data-Driven Approach: Employing assessments and data analysis to identify areas of improvement and track progress indicators, ensuring a data-driven and successful coaching process.
Relationship Building: Prioritization of cultivating strong, trusted relationships with clients, providing ongoing support and guidance to help them reach their leadership and career goals.

experiences.title: Podcast Host, A Liv Teixeira Production
experiences.description:
Facilitating discussions on personal development, business strategies, entrepreneurship, leadership, team building, and emotional intelligence, helping individuals and organizations thrive. I specialize in identifying key success factors in top performers, entrepreneurs, and CEOs across various industries. 

Check it out: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/a-liv-teixeira-production/id1449512525 or search "A LIV TEIXEIRA PRODUCTION" on all major podcast streaming platforms.

experiences.title: Health And Wellness Coach

• Educated in the importance of primary and secondary food, bio-individuality, and over 100 dietary theories

education.description: The Institute for Integrative Nutrition includes curriculum from the world’s leading experts in nutrition and wellness, including Andrew Weil, MD, Deepak Chopra, David Katz, MD, and Mark Hyman, MD. The curriculum at IIN includes topics such as lifestyle choices, holistic nutrition and coaching. The schooling includes education on primary and secondary food, bio-individuality, over 100 dietary theories and business and self development strategies and resources.

Graduated Cum Laude 
GPA: 3.537
Five Semesters of Dean's List

recommendations:
Eldrick Garcia



Liv is a young entrepreneur who is on a mission to impact when nearly everyone else her age is counting their likes on social media while awaiting the next party. 

She is an ambitious woman with a big heart who truly cares about her clients. It is immediately evident within moments of working with her. 

One of her specialties is her Deep Dive program where she listens attentively to everything you are working on and what you are trying to accomplish. 

She then does an amazing job of getting down to the root of what your true passions are, which is a huge self realization. This set me on the path my heart really yearned for, not what I thought was the right path. 

If you can work with Liv in any capacity, I’d highly recommend it!

Michael McLean



From the moment I reached out to Liv, she was totally engaged with me and couldn't be more excited to get to work. In our meeting, I was free to talk about whatever came to mind and anything I thought was worth mentioning. Yet, Liv was able to connect the seemingly random dots in a way I couldn't on my own. She's one of the best listeners I've ever spoken with and she made me feel valued and not judged at all. If you have a concern about business, relationships, purpose, or life in general, you can trust Liv to dive deep, provide actionable steps, and give you lasting clarity that you probably couldn't imagine otherwise. Go and reach out. For the small investment, the immediate outcome was well worth it, and my future results will be priceless.
